Title: The Last Airbender
Overview: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.
Keywords: fire, ice, war ship, prince, kingdom, water, village, arrest, remake, attack, avatar, air, spirit, world, domination, cheering
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, Nickelodeon Movies, Kennedy/Marshall Company, The, Industrial Light & Magic (ILM), Blinding Edge Pictures
Cast: Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Jackson Rathbone
